m_szDocTitle: Hyundai Motor Reveals Hydrogen & Electric Vehicle Station | Korea IT Times
m_szDocSumamry: Hyundai Motor Reveals Hydrogen & Electric Vehicle Station By Oh Hae-young (info@koreaittimes.com) Hyundai Motor Group has completed the nation’s first hydrogen fueling station doubling as an electric-car charging station, and revealed the “fusion” station, the key infrastructure for realizing the so-called hydrogen economy, on Jan. 18. The fusion station, created by adding EV charging facilities to an existing hydrogen fueling station, located within Jingok Industrial Complex in Gwangju, can fuel up both EVs and hydrogen vehicles.
